snippet: Blake Griffin, James Harden and Andre Iguodala made the final cut as Coach Mike Krzyzewski announced the roster for the United States Olympic basketball team.
abstract: United States men’s basketball team announced its Olympic roster, filling the three spots it had remaining; Blake Griffin, James Harden and the Andre Iguodala are added to the nine players who had already secured a spot; all three will play in their first Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Blake Griffin, James Harden and Andre Iguodala made the final cut as Coach Mike Krzyzewski announced the roster for the United States Olympic basketball team.

headline.seo: U.S. Olympic Basketball Team Is Unveiled
headline.main: U.S. Olympic Basketball Roster Is Versatile, but Not Tall
headline.print_headline: U.S. Olympic Roster: Not Tall, but Versatile
